transcription.text: Good morning po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Hello? Hello? Sorry, hello?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Suna May Ladong. Good morning po. Suna May Ladong po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Yes, why? This is regarding my partner. Why?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Pagkinalangin po sa inyo sir. I'm Robby Fernandez po from Credit Max. Kuling behalf of Maya Bank po. Over the recorded line. I stayed ko po kasi sana makukulong
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay. Okay.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Suna May Ladong. Nandiyan po ba siya sir?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Nasa ibang house ako ngayon eh. Pero why are you calling this number regarding my partner? You have his or her phone number, diba?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Opo.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Hindi po kasi siya sumasagot sa amin sir. Kaya po itong number na po ito yung natawagan po ng aming system po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay. So are you regarding what side?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Bali. Bali sir. Hindi kasi siya pwede mag-disclose sa inyo sir. Makikisire na lang po sana ko sir dito kayo. Sir.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay. Pero I'm just curious kasi nakausap ko na siya actually. She's not receiving though any phone call of yours. So why is that?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Pwede mahingi ko na lang po yung may bago po bang number siya ma'am. O ibang number po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: No. It's still the same phone number that she has with Maya. And dapat siya ang nire-reach out niyo. Nagtataka nga rin siya bakit hindi siya ang nire-reach out niyo instead of this phone number.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: O ibang number po. Ayun nga po. Naka-system po kasi kami sir. Isang number po ni ma'am is hindi po makul po or makontakt po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay. Sige. I'll have her check this as well. Sige. Sige. Thank you. Thank you.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Makapo. Makapo. Sige po. Makikisire na lang po kami sir. Napasensya na po sir. Maraming salamat po.

transcription.text: Thank you.

translation.tagalog: Good morning po.
translation.english: Good morning.

translation.tagalog: Hello? Hello? Sorry, hello?
translation.english: Hello? Hello? Sorry, hello?

translation.tagalog: Suna May Ladong. Good morning po. Suna May Ladong po.
translation.english: Suna May Ladong. Good morning. This is Suna May Ladong.

translation.tagalog: Yes, why? This is regarding my partner. Why?
translation.english: Yes, why? This is regarding my partner. Why?

translation.tagalog: Pagkinalangin po sa inyo sir. I'm Robby Fernandez po from Credit Max. Kuling behalf of Maya Bank po. Over the recorded line. I stayed ko po kasi sana makukulong
translation.english: Allow me to introduce myself, sir. I'm Robby Fernandez from Credit Max, calling on behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line. I’m just trying to...

translation.tagalog: Okay. Okay.
translation.english: Okay. Okay.

translation.tagalog: Suna May Ladong. Nandiyan po ba siya sir?
translation.english: Is Suna May Ladong there, sir?

translation.tagalog: Nasa ibang house ako ngayon eh. Pero why are you calling this number regarding my partner? You have his or her phone number, diba?
translation.english: I’m at a different house now. But why are you calling this number regarding my partner? You have his or her phone number, right?

translation.tagalog: Opo.
translation.english: Yes.

translation.tagalog: Okay.
translation.english: Okay.

translation.tagalog: Hindi po kasi siya sumasagot sa amin sir. Kaya po itong number na po ito yung natawagan po ng aming system po.
translation.english: It’s just that she’s not answering us, sir. That’s why this number was the one our system called.

translation.tagalog: Okay. So are you regarding what side?
translation.english: Okay. So what is this regarding?

translation.tagalog: Bali. Bali sir. Hindi kasi siya pwede mag-disclose sa inyo sir. Makikisire na lang po sana ko sir dito kayo. Sir.
translation.english: Well, sir, I can’t really disclose details to you. We’re just asking for your help, sir.

translation.tagalog: Okay. Pero I'm just curious kasi nakausap ko na siya actually. She's not receiving though any phone call of yours. So why is that?
translation.english: Okay. But I’m just curious because I actually spoke to her. She said she hasn't received any calls from you. So why is that?

translation.tagalog: Pwede mahingi ko na lang po yung may bago po bang number siya ma'am. O ibang number po.
translation.english: Can I ask if she has a new number, sir? Or any other number?

translation.tagalog: No. It's still the same phone number that she has with Maya. And dapat siya ang nire-reach out niyo. Nagtataka nga rin siya bakit hindi siya ang nire-reach out niyo instead of this phone number.
translation.english: No. It's still the same phone number she has with Maya. And you should be reaching out to her. She's also wondering why you’re calling this number instead.

translation.tagalog: O ibang number po. Ayun nga po. Naka-system po kasi kami sir. Isang number po ni ma'am is hindi po makul po or makontakt po.
translation.english: Yes, another number. It’s just that in our system, Ma’am’s number can’t be reached or contacted.

translation.tagalog: Okay. Sige. I'll have her check this as well. Sige. Sige. Thank you. Thank you.
translation.english: Okay. I’ll have her check this as well. Alright. Thank you. Thank you.

translation.tagalog: Makapo. Makapo. Sige po. Makikisire na lang po kami sir. Napasensya na po sir. Maraming salamat po.
translation.english: Yes, sir. Alright. We’re just asking for your help, sir. Sorry for the trouble. Thank you very much.

translation.tagalog: Thank you.
translation.english: Thank you.

translation.tagalog: Thank you po sir. Thank you po.
translation.english: Thank you, sir. Thank you.

translation.tagalog: Thank you.
translation.english: Thank you.
